That answer depends entirely on YOUR belief … OK, not on your belief really, for example, if you were to really believe the Moon was made of cheese, that would not mean the moon is actually made of cheese, BUT you would believe it was …. So, back to the answer - if by “ghosts” you mean spirits, then yes, they do exist … You can use very basic physics to prove that - “spirits” are pure energy, and as such we know, energy cannot be created nor destroyed so yes, they exist … With the reams of accounts of encounters with spirits that is available, from over centuries, we can be relatively sure “something is out there … Add in modern physics and the wealth of equipment for detecting energy and I say we can be almost 100% sure something is there … Remember the display you are seeing on your computer right now is the result of actions performed by energy … You can’t see the wireless connection, the cell phone call, the satellite radio or tv, but you can see the result produced by something that is invisible to our eyes, and yet we know exists … Spirits are the exact same thing … The term “ghost” has been applied to this very day to anything spirit focused - much the same way as we continue to call a tissue a Kleenex or a copy machine a Xerox … You get the idea … Ghost = Spirit = Soul and so on … In true Parapsychology, a “ghost” is a very specific type of residule energy that is not to conflated with a sentient spirit, but we do not need to deal with that now … So, from my perspective, yes - they do exist, they always have and always will … I hope this helps …
